resources.string: Ask for a password each time
To connect, type the server\'s address in the Windows Explorer address bar, or use any FTP client.
You cannot the share root directory
You must be connected to a local network
Changes the name of the new file
Choose an activity to open the file
An operation is currently running. Please wait until it finishes.
Are you sure you want to clear the history?
Are you sure you want to clear the thumbnail cache?
Are you sure you want to delete temporary files?
It is time for scheduled indexing. Would you like to perform an index now?
There is already a folder with the same name in the directory. What do you want to do?
There is already a file with the same name in the directory. What do you want to do?
Are you sure you want to delete \"%\"?
Are you sure to abort the current operation?
Are you sure you want to delete all bookmarks?
Are you sure you want to delete bookmark \"%\" ?
Performing an index. This can take several minutes. Proceed?
Are you sure you want to clear all index data? This operation can not be undone.
Are you sure you want to stop indexing?
Are you sure you want to clear file type associations?
Changes have been made to the "%". Do you wish to save them?
Are you sure you want to change the ownership of this file?
It looks like BusyBox is not installed on your device or its version is outdated. It is required to explore the root of your filesystem. Do you want to install it now?
SkyDrive does not support \"%\" files. Operation has been aborted.
There is not enough free space to complete the operation. Size: %, available: %.
This file is too big. Only files up to 75kB are supported for editing. Bigger files will be supported soon.
You did not specify a server name
You did not specify a computer name
You did not specify a port number
You did not specify user name
Only a locally-stored file can be added to the archive
No activity capable of opening this file was found
Are you sure you want to delete % item{1:|__:s}?
To create a folder shortcut, choose \"Create shortcut\" from the context menu.
Show Unix style permissions instead of last modification date (root files only).
Show fast scroll thumb in the file list
Hides the system status bar in portrait mode
Hides the system status bar in landscape mode
Adjust size of the file list in portrait mode
Adjust size of the file list in landscape mode
You can also exit the app by long pressing the back key
The app will start with recently viewed directories
Dropping an item to a folder in the same panel
Dropping an item to the second panel

Solid Explorer uses a master password to encrypt all login credentials. If you care about security it is recommended to use this feature. You will be prompted for the master password only once unless you restart the app. Otherwise default encryption without a password is used. Would you like to use this feature?
Disabling master password will cause switching to the default password. You will never be asked for it. Login credentials will still be encrypted. Do you want to proceed?
If you have any previous bookmarks encrypted with the default password, they will be removed. Continue?
Password must be at least 6 characters, no more than 16 characters
Encrypt all login credentials with a master password
I don\'t remember my old password
Warning! If you set the new password right now, then all bookmarks, which passwords has been encrypted using the old one, will be removed.
Start filtering list instead of launching search activity
Match only beginning of the word when filtering the list
Refresh index database. It has no effect when the process is active.
Reindex storage device when it is mounted (recommended)
The time when the indexing will be triggered
How much time the index should remain in the database when its file does not exist
How often indexing will be performed
Show notifications when indexing has been completed or aborted
Delete information about applications used to open particular file types
Temporary files will be removed on app exit
Learn about Solid Explorer\'s major features
Search your device using Solid Explorer
Ooooops! Solid Explorer has crashed. Please send the report to the developer to help him fix the issue !
Unexpected error, please send a report...
Please click here to help fix the issue.
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help me fix this by sending me error data.
Please provide detailed information about the problem below. In most cases it is impossible to reproduce the problem without your feedback.
Language correction by courtesy of Steven Schoen
Adjust the size of icons and text in the file list
Looks like the DiskUsage is not installed. This app shows the memory usage in a very sophisticated and user friendly way. Do you want to install it now?
Check if you prefer the English as a primary language. Takes effect after restart.
When checked, image thumbnails will be loaded while using mobile data connection.
Show two panels at once when in landscape orientation
The application has to be restarted in order to apply changes. Continue?
Customize the overall color scheme. Will drastically slow down application startup.
Change the hue and saturation of the current color scheme
Put the shortcut in the status bar when the app is running in the background
Are you sure you want to copy this to the opposite panel?
Are you sure you want to move this to the opposite panel?
Please read the FAQ before asking any question
Show information about directory content and used space in the explorer window
Show human readable device labels instead of real directory names, ex. \"SD Card\" instead of \"sdcard0\"
Swap Internal Memory with SD Card labels in case of incorrect detection.

Before reporting a bug please do the following:

1. Check whether the issue exists in other file manager apps.
2. Read the FAQ.

Did you complete the steps above?

Thank you for using Solid Explorer, your trial is over now. To continue using this app, buy me a virtual beer by purchasing the unlocker from Google Play. Do it only when you are fully satisfied with the app.
Thank you for purchasing the full version of Solid Explorer. I hope you will enjoy it.
This function is not available in current system version
% has been set as default ringtone
% has been set as default notification sound
% has been set as default alarm sound
Backup application data to a desired file
Choose a backup file from which the data will be restored
Visit the Solid Explorer\'s support page
Please note, that this feature is experimental and will likely not work properly on your current Android version.
Solid Explorer could not verify the trial period. Please enable internet connection now or within 2 days. Otherwise your trial period will be over.
Allow to go to the root directory when hitting the Back button
Keep the screen on during the file transfers. Check, if you experience transfer slowdowns when the screen is off.
Image thumbnails will be removed on app exit
Specify which applications should open desired file types
There is already the same file in temporary directory. Would you like to open the cached file or download the fresh one?
The temporary file % has been modified. Would you like to upload it back?
% temporary file{1:|__:s} have been modified. Would you like to upload them?
Are you sure you want to restore default settings for this item?
No wifi available. Would you like to setup a hot spot on your device?
When enabled, you can change size of the lists using pinch gesture
Master password has not been set
The certificate is not signed by a trusted authority. Do you want to accept it?
Rescan all media after each file transfer. Use this option if the gallery doesn\'t update properly.
